programme.title: Kicks, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: A 15-year-old (Jahking Guillory) recruits his two best friends (Christopher Meyer, Christopher Jordan Wallace) to help him retrieve his stolen Air Jordan sneakers from a neighborhood thug (Kofi Siriboe).

programme.title: Wilson, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: After reuniting with his ex-wife (Laura Dern), a lonely and neurotic misanthrope (Woody Harrelson) tries to form a connection with the teenage daughter (Isabella Amara) he never knew he had.

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: London publicist Edina Monsoon and best friend Patsy Stone flee to the French Riviera after accidentally knocking supermodel Kate Moss into the River Thames.

programme.title: Low Tide, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: When teenager Alan and his younger brother find a bag of gold coins in a dead man's island home, they try to hide it from their friends -- but one of them, suspicious and violently unpredictable, is willing to do anything to get the money.

programme.title: It Comes at Night, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious apocalypse leaves the world with few survivors, two families are forced to share a home in an uneasy alliance to keep the outside evil at bay -- only to learn that the true horror may come from within.

programme.title: House of 1000 Corpses, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: Four travelers take refuge in the home of a clan of demented killers. Written and directed by musician Rob Zombie.

programme.title: Cut Bank, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Things go from bad to worse when a murder witness (Liam Hemsworth) in small-town Montana tries to leverage the crime into a get-rich-quick scheme.

programme.title: Problemista, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: Alejandro, an aspiring toy designer from El Salvador, tries to bring his fanciful ideas to life and chase his dream in New York City with the help of his erratic employer.

programme.title: Tell, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: A small-time thief (Milo Ventimiglia) makes a big score and tries to keep it from his ex-partner, his ex-wife and other greedy sorts.

programme.title: Confidence, (2003, Crime Story)
programme.desc: A con man (Edward Burns) and his crew swindle a gangster's accountant, then try to repay him by stealing from a crooked banker.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla, (1974, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An Okinawan monster-god helps Godzilla defeat his bionic double.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Using recovered extraterrestrial technology, the nations of Earth collaborate on an immense defense program to protect the planet. When the aliens attack with unprecedented force, only the ingenuity of a few brave men and women can save the world.

programme.title: D...: The Musical, (2023, Musical)
programme.desc: Two self-obsessed businessmen discover they're long-lost identical twins and come together to plot the reunion of their divorced parents.

programme.title: Home Again, (2017, Romance)
programme.desc: Separated from her husband, Alice lets three young men -- Harry, George and Teddy -- stay in her guesthouse. As Alice develops a budding romance with Harry, her newfound happiness comes crashing down when her ex shows up with a suitcase in his hand.

programme.title: The Color Purple, (2023, Musical)
programme.desc: Torn apart from her sister and her children, Celie faces many hardships, including an abusive husband. With support from a singer and her stepdaughter, she ultimately finds extraordinary strength in the unbreakable bonds of a new kind of sisterhood.

programme.title: Invictus, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Following the fall of apartheid, Nelson Mandela (Morgan Freeman) tries to unite his countrymen by supporting the South African rugby team's underdog bid for the 1995 World Cup Championship.

programme.title: Gifted, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: A man (Chris Evans) wages a legal battle against his mother (Lindsay Duncan) for custody of his orphaned niece (Mckenna Grace), a young mathematics prodigy who wants to live with him.

programme.title: Gloria Bell, (2018, Romance)
programme.desc: A free-spirited divorcee spends her nights on the dance floor, joyfully letting loose at clubs around Los Angeles. She soon finds herself thrust into an unexpected new romance, filled with the joys of budding love and the complications of dating.

programme.title: It Follows, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: Following a strange sexual encounter, a teenager (Maika Monroe) has disturbing visions and the inescapable feeling that someone -- or something -- is stalking her.

programme.title: State of Play, (2009, Thriller)
programme.desc: An investigative journalist (Russell Crowe) stumbles into a cover-up of gigantic proportions as he and his partner probe the murder of a beloved congressman's (Ben Affleck) mistress.

programme.title: Sergio Leone: The Italian Who Invented America, (2022, Documentary)
programme.desc: An homage to Italian film director Sergio Leone, credited as the pioneer of the spaghetti western subgenre, featuring interviews with Quentin Tarantino, Robert De Niro and Clint Eastwood.

programme.title: The Lovers, (2017, Romance)
programme.desc: A man and his wife, each embroiled in an extramarital affair, are sent reeling when they suddenly fall for the least likely person imaginable -- each other.

programme.title: Veronica Mars, (2014, Mystery)
programme.desc: On the eve of her law-school graduation, Veronica turns amateur sleuth once again after ex-boyfriend, Logan, becomes a murder suspect.

programme.title: It Comes at Night, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious apocalypse leaves the world with few survivors, two families are forced to share a home in an uneasy alliance to keep the outside evil at bay -- only to learn that the true horror may come from within.

programme.title: The Martian, (2015, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Left behind by his crew, a stranded astronaut must find a way to survive on Mars, while NASA and a team of international scientists work tirelessly to bring him home.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: A lieutenant general (Alan Rickman) and a colonel (Helen Mirren) face political opposition after ordering a drone missile strike to take out a group of suicide bombers in Nairobi, Kenya.

programme.title: The Devil's Rejects, (2005, Horror)
programme.desc: A vengeful sheriff and two bounty hunters track a murderous family (Sid Haig, Bill Moseley, Sheri Moon Zombie) on the run.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: A girl turning 16 likes another girl's guy (Michael Schoeffling) and feels nobody cares about her birthday.

programme.title: American Ultra, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When his secret past comes back to haunt him, a small-town stoner (Jesse Eisenberg) must use his latent, deadly skills to prevent the CIA from taking him out.

programme.title: Scream, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victim's daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: The Boss, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: After her release from prison, a former CEO (Melissa McCarthy) battles old enemies while trying to build a brownie empire with her ex-assistant (Kristen Bell).

programme.title: The Iron Claw, (2023, Biography)
programme.desc: The true story of the Von Erich brothers, who, through tragedy and triumph, under the shadow of their domineering father and coach, seek epic immortality on the biggest stage in sports.

programme.title: 3 From Hell, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Crazed killers Baby Firefly, Captain Spaulding and Otis Driftwood unleash bloody mayhem after escaping from prison.

programme.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: A fatherless teen starts to insinuate himself into the life of a renowned surgeon, his wife and two children. The full scope of his intent soon becomes menacingly clear when he confronts the doctor with a long-forgotten transgression.

programme.title: Black Adam, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Bestowed with the almighty powers of the gods, Black Adam's unique form of justice, born out of rage, is challenged by modern-day heroes who form the Justice Society: Hawkman, Dr. Fate, Atom Smasher and Cyclone.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan, (2016, Adventure)
programme.desc: Lured from Victorian England to the wilds of the Congo, Tarzan (Alexander Skarsgrd) must return to the jungle to save his captive wife (Margot Robbie) from King Leopold's devious envoy (Christoph Waltz).

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War, (2016, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A huntsman (Chris Hemsworth) and a fellow warrior (Jessica Chastain) battle an ice queen (Emily Blunt) and her evil, resurrected sister (Charlize Theron).

programme.title: The Lighthouse, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.

programme.title: House Party, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: Aspiring club promoters and best buds Damon and Kevin need a huge windfall to make their problems go away. They decide to host the party of the year at an exclusive mansion, which just happens to belong to none other than NBA superstar LeBron James.

programme.title: Good Time, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: A bank robber stops at nothing to free his brother from prison, launching himself into a nightlong odyssey through New York's dark and dangerous criminal underworld.

programme.title: Gloria Bell, (2018, Romance)
programme.desc: A free-spirited divorcee spends her nights on the dance floor, joyfully letting loose at clubs around Los Angeles. She soon finds herself thrust into an unexpected new romance, filled with the joys of budding love and the complications of dating.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla, (1974, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An Okinawan monster-god helps Godzilla defeat his bionic double.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: A masked killer continues to pursue a California student (Neve Campbell) and her friends at an Ohio college.

programme.title: The Color Purple, (2023, Musical)
programme.desc: Torn apart from her sister and her children, Celie faces many hardships, including an abusive husband. With support from a singer and her stepdaughter, she ultimately finds extraordinary strength in the unbreakable bonds of a new kind of sisterhood.

programme.title: The Accountant, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Treasury agent (J.K. Simmons) closes in on a brilliant freelance accountant (Ben Affleck) who works for dangerous criminal organizations.

programme.title: Role Models, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Forced to join a mentorship program, two irresponsible men (Seann William Scott, Paul Rudd) must help a pair of impressionable boys navigate the troubled waters of youth.

programme.title: Batman: The Killing Joke, (2016, Animated)
programme.desc: Batman (Kevin Conroy) must save Commissioner Gordon (Ray Wise) from the Joker's (Mark Hamill) twisted quest to drive him insane.

programme.title: St. Vincent, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: An unlikely bond forms between a single woman's 12-year-old son and the boozy misanthrope who lives next door.

programme.title: Superman: Unbound, (2013, Animated)
programme.desc: Superman (Matt Bomer) battles Brainiac (John Noble) to save the Krypton city of Kandor, which is miniaturized and held aboard Brainiac's ship.

programme.title: Traffik, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A couple and their two friends embark on a weekend getaway to an isolated estate in the mountains. They soon find themselves in a fight for their lives when members of a violent biker gang show up to protect their secrets from the outside world.

programme.title: Nine Lives, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: A workaholic billionaire (Kevin Spacey) tries to communicate with his family when a bizarre turn of events traps him inside the body of a cat named Mr. Fuzzypants.

programme.title: The Souvenir, (2019, Romance)
programme.desc: A shy but ambitious film student falls into an intense, emotionally fraught relationship with a charismatic but untrustworthy older man.

programme.title: Skin, (2019, Documentary)
programme.desc: Nollywood actress Beverly Naya explores Black beauty and the practice of skin bleaching in African culture.

programme.title: I Am
programme.desc: Ruth, a dedicated mother, begins to fear for her troubled teenage daughter.

programme.title: Spaceship Earth, (2020, Documentary)
programme.desc: In 1991 eight visionaries embark on a two-year experiment to quarantine themselves inside Biosphere 2 -- a self-engineered replica of Earth's ecosystem.

programme.title: Valley Girl, (2020, Musical)
programme.desc: A valley girl and a punk rocker from the city defy their parents and friends to stay together.

programme.title: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow, (2004, Adventure)
programme.desc: A daredevil aviator (Jude Law) and an ace reporter (Gwyneth Paltrow) fight an evil mastermind and his army of gigantic robots.

programme.title: Outlaws and Angels, (2016, Western)
programme.desc: In 1887, three violent fugitives hold a couple and their children (Francesca Eastwood, Madisen Beaty) hostage in their isolated New Mexico farmhouse.

programme.title: Everybody Wants Some!!, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: In 1980 Texas, a college freshman (Blake Jenner) meets his new baseball teammates (Will Brittain, Ryan Guzman), an unruly group of disco-dancing, skirt-chasing partyers.

programme.title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot, (2016, War)
programme.desc: In 2002, cable news producer Kim Barker shakes up her routine by covering the war in Kabul, Afghanistan.

programme.title: Kate & Leopold, (2001, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A Manhattan woman (Meg Ryan) falls in love with the 19th-century Duke of Albany (Hugh Jackman) who has stepped through a time portal.

programme.title: American Fiction, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: Fed up with the establishment that profits from Black entertainment that relies on tired and offensive tropes, a frustrated novelist writes an outlandish book of his own that propels him to the heart of hypocrisy and the madness he claims to disdain.

programme.title: Waiting to Exhale, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: Relationships preoccupy Phoenix friends: divorcee Bernadine (Angela Bassett), careerist Savannah (Whitney Houston), popular Robin (Lela Rochon), and Gloria, whose ex-husband is gay.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke begins to plan his escape while Sigsby is distracted trying to expose Stackhouse's disloyalty; Tim loses a friend.

programme.title: Nine Bodies in a Mexican Morgue
programme.desc: The survivors work out how to call for help, but are faced with a treacherous climb; as some of the group begin to crack under the pressure, a third death warns that they are running out of time.

programme.title: Nine Bodies in a Mexican Morgue
programme.desc: The deadly secret hidden in Flight CBZ517 is discovered, but it still doesn't explain the murders or help the survivors escape; the passengers believe they have found the traitor in the group.

programme.title: Fargo, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: A pregnant police chief (Frances McDormand) probes the murderous events that evolved from a desperate car salesman's (William H. Macy) kidnapping scheme.

programme.title: LaRoy, Texas, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mistaken for a low-rent hit man, Ray decides to play the part of a hired gun. However, when the supposedly simple plan begins to unravel, he recruits a private investigator to help him escape from the actual killer and make it out alive.

programme.title: The Parallax View, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: A reporter's investigation into a political assassination reveals a nationwide network of trained killers.

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: Clumsy Inspector Clouseau (Peter Sellers) visits a nudist camp to prove a French maid (Elke Sommer) innocent of murder.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: There is more than meets the eye with Alabama native Rocky Dale Davis; people are quick to misjudge him as a typical Southern white boy, but Rocky has a progressive outlook in his comedy.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate, (1962, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Korean War hero's (Laurence Harvey) commanding officer (Frank Sinatra) discovers he and his platoon were brainwashed.

programme.title: Diablo, (2015, Western)
programme.desc: A young Civil War veteran (Scott Eastwood) embarks on a quest to save his kidnapped wife (Camilla Belle) from a band of ruthless Mexican bandits.

programme.title: The Prize Winner of Defiance, Ohio, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: A '50s-era housewife (Julianne Moore) uses her wit and winnings from commercial jingle contests to help support her large family.

programme.title: Heaven's Gate, (1980, Western)
programme.desc: A well-educated marshal defends immigrant settlers against cattle barons in 1890s Johnson County, Wyoming.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Bridge, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: A rich Midwestern lawyer (Paul Newman), his wife (Joanne Woodward) and their children grow apart in the World War II era.

programme.title: The Fire Inside, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: The story of Claressa "T-Rex" Shields, a boxer from Flint, Mich., who trained to become the first woman in her country's history to win an Olympic gold medal in the sport.

programme.title: The Boys in the Boat, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: During the height of the Great Depression, members of the rowing team at the University of Washington get thrust into the spotlight as they compete for gold at the 1936 Olympics in Berlin.

programme.title: The Fighter, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: Having earned a shot at a world championship, boxer Micky Ward (Mark Wahlberg) reunites with his estranged brother (Christian Bale) to train for the fight and become the new "Pride of Lowell.".

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: A therapist (Robin Williams), a mathematician and working-class roughs vie for the soul of a janitor (Matt Damon) with a genius IQ.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to create revolutionary music that changes the world.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke Ellis wakes up at The Institute, a facility that abducts teenagers with psychic powers; Ms. Sigsby, the place's charismatic director, claims they're saving the world; Tim Jamieson hides from his haunted past as a small-town night knocker.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke bonds with the other Front Half residents and begins plotting his escape; Ms. Sigsby manages the fallout from a security breach; in town, Tim begins to look into The Institute, only to find himself caught up in a high-stakes standoff.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke begins to plan his escape while Sigsby is distracted trying to expose Stackhouse's disloyalty; Tim loses a friend.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: Nothing is off limits for Marlena Rodriguez; Ali Sultan reflects on his journey from the Middle East to Minnesota.

programme.title: Mr. Holmes, (2015, Mystery)
programme.desc: Long-retired and near the end of his life, Sherlock Holmes (Ian McKellen) grapples with an unreliable memory and must rely on his housekeeper's son as he revisits the still-unsolved case that led to his retirement.

programme.title: Nerve, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Partnered with a mysterious stranger (Dave Franco), a high school senior (Emma Roberts) joins a popular online game that dares players to perform increasingly dangerous stunts.

programme.title: No Stranger Than Love, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: After his girlfriend is kidnapped while on vacation, an American man is forced to smuggle cocaine over the border. If he's ever to see her alive again, he'll have to navigate a treacherous underworld of violence and greed.

programme.title: Zoolander 2, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: A special agent recruits former models Derek Zoolander and Hansel to save the world's most beautiful people from a deadly plot.

programme.title: Down to Earth, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Accidentally sent to Heaven, a comic (Chris Rock) returns to Earth in the body of a Manhattan mogul whose family is plotting to kill him.

programme.title: Heaven Can Wait, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Heavenly executive Mr. Jordan allows an angry quarterback (Warren Beatty), taken before his time, to return to Earth as a millionaire.

programme.title: Daddy's Home, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: An insecure man (Will Ferrell) competes for the affection of his stepchildren when their freewheeling father (Mark Wahlberg) breezes back into town.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything they've faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: The Institute

programme.title: H evidncias que apontam para Misa Amane como o segundo Kira.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Misa est presa, embora suas lembranas do Death Note tenham sido excludas.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Aps 50 dias presos os assassinatos continuam, Misa e Light so soltos.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Apesar de L ainda ser suspeito, Light e Misa (suas memrias de terem sido Kira foram apagadas) voltam ao quartel.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Matsuda, o elemento do corpo especial encarregado de monitor Misa, decide espionar por conta prpria
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: A equipe de L descobre que o Grupo Yotsuba est reunida em segredo para discutir a eliminao dos indivduos que so problemticos para a sua empresa.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: O Grupo Yotsuba contrata Eraldo Bobina para descobrir a identidade de L.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Misa consegue sucesso ao reduzir a um suspeito a identidade de Kira dentro do Grupo Yotsuba: Higuchi.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Higuchi do Grupo Yotsuba, tenta matar Matsuda do corpo especial.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Higuchi capturado e conta aos investigadores tudo sobre o Death Note.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Light recuperou suas memrias, em seguida d ordens a Misa que retome os assassinatos.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Light removeu todos os obstculos de seu caminho, e est perto de alcanar o seu mundo perfeito.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Aparece um novo investigador, Near, uma figura central na SPK, uma organizao dedicada a pegar Kira sem depender de L.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Light atuando como L, revela a Near que sua irm Sayu foi raptada por algum que quer troc-la por um Death Note.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Light tenta descobrir onde Mello e da mfia se escondem.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Mello entra na sede da SPK para recuperar uma foto dele e certificar-se de no ser morto por Kira.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Near contata o novo quartel geral da fora especial e determina que Kira est entre os seus integrantes.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Enquanto Somos Jovens, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Josh e Cornelia so um casal de quarentes que decide passar mais tempo com um casal mais jovem que eles. Apesar da juventude e gosto pelo cinema alimentar este novo vnculo, as suspeitas sobre a honestidade do rapaz comeam a pesar.

programme.title: Meet Bill, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Um homem frustrado com seu trabalho e com seu casamento tem a ajuda de um adolescente muito seguro de si e de uma jovem vendedora para retomar sua vida. Os dois o tornam mais confiante e independente.

programme.title: Amor secreto, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Leonardo chega de viagem; Alejandra repreende Irene pela denncia equivocada; Leo hospitalizado devido a um acidente; Leonardo manda Irene buscar um anel de noivado.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Jacob indicado ao cargo de CEO e seu amigo Prospero o encoraja a agarrar a oportunidade. Mas sua me o aconselha a se manter afastado da famlia Aboyami.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Jacob enfrenta as queixas de Lerato; Bola procura seu pai para o matar.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Folak descobre o cadver do seu pai e as suas suspeitas recaem sobre Bola; Bola quer enviar os restos mortais do seu pai para Lagos; os ltimos desejos do Chefe Abayomi so revelados.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Bola quer unir o Conselho sua causa e ameaa Jacob se ele ficar em Lagos; os associados de Jacob esto nervosos por Abayomi estar morto; o tribunal aceita o pedido de Bola e cancela o testamento; Folak descobre a duplicidade de Prospero.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Jacob visita Folak e descobre a traio de seu amigo; Bola diz a Prospero que pode influenciar o setor energtico; Lerato est no hospital e corre o risco de sofrer um aborto espontneo.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Jacob e Folake tm um filho e ela anuncia a Jacob que vai a Lagos para apanhar seu irmo; Bola preso pelo assassinato de seu pai; o testamento reconhecido: Jacob se torna Chefe iorub; graas s suas ligaes, Bola sai da priso.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Jacob, um brilhante homem de negcios, est prestes a obter um grande contrato governamental da rea de energia. Seu chefe revela a ele que seu pai biolgico e Jacob promete realizar o sonho do homem: construir um imprio e manter a famlia unida.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Jacob confessa a sua infidelidade a Lerato e parte; Prospero tenta subornar Glenda e oferece o seu trabalho em troca de informaes; Jacob apoia o seu irmo e investe na empresa de segurana que acaba de criar.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Jacob e Folak vo a Lagos para discutir a herana com Glenda; Prospero tem um encontro com o Andile por causa do roubo; Folak descobre que Bigelow ordenou o ataque plataforma petrolfera.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Bola acusada; Jacob percebe que ainda est apaixonado por Zanl; Bola chega a Joanesburgo; Prospero apanhado subornando o ministro; Prospero ataca Jacob.

programme.title: Seduo Perigosa, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Josie uma adolescente que se muda para uma pequena cidade no interior dos EUA e se envolve com o solitrio Hank. Conforme o passado vem tona, as verdadeiras intenes da jovem se tornam mais sinistras do que aparentavam ser.

programme.title: Amor Rebelde, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Jack sempre suspeitou que havia algo mais na vida alm do trabalho e da faculdade. Aps encontrar com a bela Evelyn e seus amigos, decide fazer uma mudana radical e acrescenta sua agenda festas e noites selvagens em Londres.

programme.title: Marjorie Prime, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Marjorie, uma violinista de 85 anos, descobre que sua memria est comeando a falhar. Ela passa a maior parte do tempo com a sua filha e a uma verso artificial de seu falecido esposo, programada para fazer com que Marjorie lembre da sua histria.

programme.title: Ningum se mexa, porque o torneio est pegando fogo! A Bladers International Cup comeou oficialmente e nada parecido foi visto.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Aunque parece que todo Blader en el mundo quiere derrotarlo, Ojo Rojo contina arrasando en el torneo. Al menos, hasta que el antiguo pupilo del Snake Pit, Norman, tenga oportunidad de enfrentarlo.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Este campeonato coloca rivais contra rivais, inimigos contra inimigos e amigos contra amigos.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: O Imperador subiu superfcie, a Estrela caiu do cu e as Serpentes do Poo das Cobras esto soltas! Bladers de todos os tipos e tamanhos se enfrentam para determinar quem o melhor de todos.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: A classificao no favorece o BC Sol. Ser necessrio um grande impulso de confiana para estes Bladers recuperarem o seu melhor nvel.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Entre todos os competidores da International Bladers Cup, sempre houve um na frente do peloto, e Valt est se preparando para enfrent-lo.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Quando Valt derrotado em sua ltima partida, sua nica esperana encontrar inspirao para fortalec-lo. Felizmente, Free de la Hoya pode ser quem pode ajud-lo.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Os competidores lutam com unhas e dentes para garantir uma vaga na prxima rodada.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: O Imperador reinou por muito tempo. Muitos Bladers desafiaram Kurt, com a vitria em mente, mas todos falharam em alcan-la.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst
programme.sub-title: Trabalho em equipe! Para as semifinais!

programme.title: Com o cenrio preparado para as meias-finais, os restantes candidatos so simplesmente excepcionais. O caminho para o topo requer fora bruta, estratgias brilhantes e perseverana sem fim.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Ningum poderia imaginar o quo intenso esse torneio seria. Free est mostrando um lado completamente diferente, Shu est redefinindo o significado da palavra destruio.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: o que todos estvamos esperando. A oportunidade de ganhar o ttulo, deixar o mundo orgulhoso e reconquistar um amigo para toda a vida. Quer Valt consiga a vitria ou no, ele e Valtryek faro a nica coisa pela qual vieram: Let it Rip.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Depois de dois anos como Campeo Mundial, Valt est pronto para levar Valtryek ao prximo nvel; Super Z Turbo! Em sua jornada, Valt conhece Aiger Akabane.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Determinado a ficar mais forte e lutar contra os melhores, Aiger se transfere para a Academia Beigoma. Seu objetivo lutar contra o sucessor de Valt, Fubuki Sumiye.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: A partida entre Aiger e Fubuki continua. Aiger descobre que no o nico irmo Akabane na Academia Beigoma quando descobre que sua irm mais nova, Naru, tambm est se transferindo!
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Valt e Kurt Baratier lutam e conforme se espalha a notcia sobre a fora de Aiger, ele tem outra chance contra Fubuki.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Lui desafia e luta contra Valt pelo campeonato mundial.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst
programme.sub-title: Super Z Confronto! Valquria vs Longinus

programme.title: O vencedor da Luinor Cup ser coroado Campeo Asitico. Lui desafia trs Bladers teimosos para uma batalha um contra trs.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Aps a derrota para Lui, Aiger decide intensificar seus treinos e cria algo que pega todos de surpresa.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Depois de testemunhar o poder do novo Turbo Bey de Fubuki, Suoh recorre a uma misteriosa herana de famlia para criar a sua prpria.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Em um empate azarado, Toko enfrenta Suoh em sua primeira batalha do torneio. Tendo visto recentemente o poder de Suoh, Aiger, Fubuki e Cap'n treinam com Toko para se preparar para sua partida.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Aiger e Ranjiro se enfrentam e o vencedor avana para as semifinais.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Os confrontos das semifinais esto anunciados! Fubuki forado a enfrentar um velho amigo, enquanto Aiger precisa enfrentar um novo. Fubuki, o trabalhador, contra Suoh, o gnio.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: amigo contra amigo, equilbrio contra resistncia, Aiger contra Hae-jin! Enquanto Aiger est animado para enfrentar seu amigo, Hae-jin est dividido entre Blading e tiro com arco. Enquanto isso, Fubuki estende um ramo de oliveira para Suoh.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: A final da Taa Linor finalmente chegou. Quem sair vencedor: Suoh ou Aiger? De qualquer forma, ambos deveriam estar preocupados com a chegada de dois novos Bladers misteriosos. Quem so eles e o que querem?
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Aiger pode ter vencido a Taa Linor, mas alguma coisa poder prepar-lo para enfrentar algum to forte como Lui? Ele tem algum treinamento para fazer com Capito e Hae-Jin, mas primeiro, ele deve lidar com uma estranha cartomante.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Chegou a hora: Aiger x Lui. Justamente quando a batalha no pode ficar mais pica, Aiger sofre um grande revs. Um rosto inesperado aparece, oferecendo conselhos estranhos que ajudam Aiger a voltar partida.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Aiger, Hae-Jin e Cap'n embarcam no Battleship Cruise. Aiger ter que enfrentar amigos e inimigos se quiser ter a chance de lutar contra o campeo mundial Valt Aoi. Mas com dois membros do Turbo 4 a bordo, este ser o seu desafio mais difcil at agora.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Outro membro do Turbo 4 entra na briga: um aprendiz do nico Xander Shakadera.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst
programme.sub-title: O Heri e a Espada Sagrada

programme.title: Um navio abandonado surge das brumas. Quando todos vo investigar, eles descobrem que h mais neste navio fantasma do que aparenta.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst
programme.sub-title: A Super Z Battle on a Ghost Ship

programme.title: Bem a tempo para uma srie de novos desafios, a tripulao se junta ao estranho Blader mascarado que conheceram a bordo do navio fantasma. Xavier aumenta a competio e leva sua rivalidade com Aiger para o prximo nvel
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: A busca de Aiger por Fubuki o leva ao ginsio dos mundialmente famosos Raging Bulls. Aiger e seus amigos aprendem rapidamente que, graas ao seu treinamento com o nico Shu Kurenai, Fubuki no o mesmo Blader de antes.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Aps a vitria de Phi no Battle Royale, os outros Bladers tm a chance de redeno com uma batalha de duplas. Alguns Bladers devem aprender a trabalhar com seus inimigos se quiserem uma chance de permanecer a bordo.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Com apenas uma estrela restante, Ranjiro, Suoh e Hae-Jin devem arriscar tudo para permanecer na competio. Aiger acabar se despedindo de um amigo? Enquanto isso, Kyle perde mais que uma batalha.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst
programme.sub-title: A furiosa batalha Bey de 3 vias

programme.title: Os Bladers deixados a bordo devem fazer com que cada lanamento conte se quiserem manter suas estrelas Bey. Fubuki e Suoh se enfrentam em uma batalha pela sobrevivncia. Aps meses de treinamento, Fubuki est pronto para enfrentar seu velho amigo?
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Aiger, Xavier e Laban partem para uma corrida de caiaque, mas ficam presos em uma ilha deserta. Os outros Bladers conseguiro encontr-los antes que o terreno perigoso o faa?
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: A tripulao segue para El Astro, casa do mundialmente famoso BC Sol. Enquanto estava em terra, Naru encontra o antigo mentor e treinador do BC Sol de seu pai, Raul. Enquanto isso, Aiger encontra Free De La Hoya e o desafia para uma batalha.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Depois de se despedir de Xavier, restam apenas quatro Bladers na competio. Aps a atualizao, Aquiles pode alternar entre os modos de resistncia, defesa e ataque, mas Aiger luta para aproveitar esse vasto potencial.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Relaes de Famlia, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Um homem que se sente enterrado sob uma montanha de dvidas cria uma ligao inesperada com um jovem em uma agncia de cobrana enquanto ambos lutam para se libertar de dvidas, tanto financeiras quanto emocionais.

programme.title: 438 Dias, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Os jornalistas suecos Martin Schibbye e Johan Persson cruzam ilegalmente a fronteira da Somlia com a Etipia para relatar como a busca implacvel por petrleo afetou a populao da regio de Ogaden, isolada e cheia de conflitos.

programme.title: Sombras do Terror, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Adolescente que mora com o av abusivo tenta proteger o melhor amigo contra os valentes da escola. Ao descobrir uma criatura assassina em seu galpo de ferramentas, ele e o colega bolam um plano de vingana.

programme.title: Perdido na Fama, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Turk Henry, um baixista de uma banda mega-platina recentemente separada, leva sua esposa mimada para frias exticas no Chile, mas ela levada por um grupo de piratas que querem dinheiro para comprar um barco.

programme.title: O Milagre, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Em 1961, um professor em uma aldeia remota inspira os aldees a deixarem de lado suas disputas e unirem foras para construir uma escola para as prximas geraes.

programme.title: Uma Aventura e Tanto, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: O co vira-lata Pluto aparece de repente e muda a vida da famlia Davis, que est enfrentando tempos difceis. Em pouco tempo, ele salva uma criana, traz conforto a um garoto doente e repara um relacionamento desgastado de pai e filho.

programme.title: O Rei da Montanha, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Espen Ash Lad, filho de um pobre agricultor, embarca em uma misso perigosa com seus irmos para salvar a princesa de um vilo conhecido como o Rei da Montanha. O objetivo ganhar uma recompensa e salvar a fazenda da sua famlia da runa.

programme.title: A Gangue Zip Zap, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Os irmos gmeos Zip e Zap so enviados para uma escola muito rgida. O diretor um homem muito bravo e que repudia qualquer forma de lazer. Cansados dessa situao, Zip e Zap formam um grupo para poder fazer suas travessuras e desafiar o diretor.

programme.title: Anton - Laos de Amizade, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: A amizade entre um garoto judeu e outro cristo, companheiros inseparveis, em uma pequena vila da Ucrnia invadida pelos bolcheviques depois da Primeira Guerra Mundial.

programme.desc: Temari encontra Kakashi e sua equipe. Naruto explode de raiva pelos Akatsuki. Como tambm hospeda uma besta de cauda dentro de si, Naruto entende o que Gaara est sofrendo. Kankuro infectado por um veneno. Sem um antdoto, ele ter poucos dias de vida.

programme.desc: Chega uma mensagem da Aldeia da Areia sobre o sequestro do Kazekage. Tsunade manda a equipe Kakashi para a aldeia. Kankuro comea a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as tticas dos bonecos no funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas tticas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Ponte Tenchi
programme.desc: Os ninjas tentam salvar Kankuro. Vov Chiyo, perita em veneno, chamada. Uma tempestade de areia atrasa Naruto, Sakura e Kakashi. Tsunade se preocupa e envia Guy e sua equipe. O akatsuki e Gaara comeam o jutsu de selamento e os nove drages fantasmas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Nove Caudas Se Liberta
programme.desc: Sakura trata Kankuro, deixando todos espantados com suas mos firmes. Vov Chiyo fica emocionada por Tsunade ter enviado sua prpria aprendiz e pela determinao de Sakura. Kankuro fornece informaes sobre os Akatsuki. Kakashi envia um co de caa ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia
programme.desc: Pakkun acha o esconderijo dos Akatsuki. Temari recebe ordens para ajudar a proteger a aldeia. Vov Chiyo se oferece para ficar no lugar de Temari. Naruto e Sakura ficam chocados com a histria das bestas de cauda.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Orochimaru Versus Jinchuriki
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi encontra Itachi Uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Guy e sua equipe comeam a lutar contra um amargo rival, Kisame, que lana um poderoso chakra para subjugar o ninja da folha. Seu jutsu aprisiona Neji, Lee e Tenten.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura
programme.desc: Guy se arrepende ao ver seus trs alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sem oxignio, Tenten vai ficando fraca, e Guy se prepara para usar um jutsu secreto e proibido. Naruto cai no genjutsu de Itachi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo e Sakura salvam Naruto do genjutsu de Itachi. Kakashi comea um contra-ataque e exibe toda sua destreza. Guy enfrenta dificuldades contra Kisame, mas o derrota com um poderoso jutsu. Os ninjas da folha conseguem derrotar seu arquiminigo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio
programme.desc: Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao. Vov Chiyo explica a conexo entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lgrimas escorrem em seu rosto.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Pgina Inacabada
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy fazem uma pausa. Quando a perseguio recomea, Kakashi explica a Chiyo que Naruto tambm um jinchuriki. Chiyo lamenta ter sido ela que selou o shukaku dentro de Gaara... Gaara engolfado por uma luz branca.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltrao: O Covil Da Cobra!
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki, mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma viso chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cpias idnticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vov Chiyo e Sakura no faam nada precipitado.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante...
programme.desc: A luta entre av e neto comea. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destrudo primeiro. S a prpria av consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratgia usaro?

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado
programme.desc: Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro

programme.title: O Parceiro do Diabo, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Clay Lomax um assaltante de banco que foi trado e ferido por seu parceiro, e por isso foi condenado a oito anos de priso.

programme.title: Da Terra Nascem os Homens, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Aps a morte de seu marido, Martha e sua filha Hilary decidem seguir o sonho do falecido: popularizar a raa de touros Hereford no Oeste Americano. Elas leiloam seu touro premiado para um fazendeiro ingls no Texas e partem em viagem rumo ao Oeste.

programme.title: O Homem com a Morte nos Olhos, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Na cidade de Hard Times, um estranho cavalga e aterroriza o pequeno povoado. Ele mata vrios habitantes da cidade, incluindo Fee, o fundador da cidade.

programme.title: A Marca Rubra, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Choya, um pistoleiro de moral distorcida, convencido por Leffingwell a se passar pelo filho do rancheiro Richard Lavery, que est desaparecido h vinte e cinco anos e, com isso, possa herdar a fortuna de sua famlia.

programme.title: O Resgate do Bandoleiro, (1957, Western)

programme.title: A Marca do Zorro, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: Don Diego Vega chamado de volta de seu treinamento com os oficiais de elite na Espanha para a Califrnia, onde encontra seu pai, o alcaide, deposto e o povo vivendo sob o jugo tirano dos espanhis.

programme.title: O Pequeno Grande Homem, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: A histria do Velho-Oeste contada atravs dos olhos de Jack Crabb, sequestrado pelos ndios quando criana e que acabou vivendo dos dois lados: homens brancos e "seres humanos", como os ndios chamavam a si mesmos.

programme.title: Meu Amigo P Grande, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Percy Caldwell encontra um novo amigo, P Grande, uma criatura de dois metros e meio de altura. Mas quando dois valentes encontram o P Grande, eles decidem captur-lo. Agora cabe a Percy, Leonard e Madison resgatar o P Grande e devolv-lo sua casa.

programme.title: Imprio Proibido, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: No incio do sculo 18, o cartgrafo Jonathan Green empreende uma viagem cientfica da Europa para o Oriente. Passando pela Transilvnia e cruzando as montanhas dos Crpatos, ele encontra uma pequena vila perdida na floresta.

programme.title: Em Busca do Paraso, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Forado fazer uma jornada perigosa, um nobre guerreiro se depara com inmeras dificuldades, lugares misteriosos, magia e aventura para chegar ao que seria o paraso distante.

programme.title: As Travessuras de Uma Sereia, (2016, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Um projeto de propriedade de Xuan envolvendo a recuperao do mar ameaa a subsistncia das sereias que dependem do mar para sobreviver.A sereia Shan enviada para parar Xuan e lev-lo para que faa projeto em outro local.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresrio em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingana do drago, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendrio lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmo de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingana.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China e na Amrica, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Jet Li Wong Fei-Hong, heri chins que vai Amrica, salvo por ndios e luta contra a explorao de trabalhadores chineses por um tirano local.

programme.title: Drages para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as guas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.

programme.title: Samurai X - O Inferno De Kyoto, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Kenshin Himura vai contra o puro mal Makoto Shishio que est tentando derrubar o governo Meiji. O destino do pas est em jogo quando Kenshin Himura pega a espada que ele jurou nunca mais sacar.

programme.title: Punhos da Vingana, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Em Xangai, um ex-campeo de artes marciais mistas e herdeiro de uma corporao multibilionria, se junta a uma informante da polcia, para investigar a morte de seu irmo assassinado em um torneio de boxe underground

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: Vale da Luta, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Depois que a jovem Tori encontrada morta, sua irm Windsor inicia uma investigao por conta prpria e descobre que ela lutava para pagar suas despesas.

programme.title: Perseguio Explosiva, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Um dubl se envolve acidentalmente em crimes envolvendo relquias misteriosas e agora precisa lutar para sobreviver ao longo de uma srie de aventuras perigosas e incrveis.

programme.title: Robinson Crusoe On Mars, (1964, Adventure)
programme.desc: Stranded on Mars with only a monkey as a companion, an astronaut must figure out how to find oxygen, water, and food on the lifeless planet.

programme.title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers, (1956, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy)
programme.desc: People accuse their loved ones of being emotionless impostors. At first, Dr. Bennell tries to convince them theyre wrong, but theyre not. Plant-like extraterrestrials have invaded Earth, taking possession of their souls while they sleep.

programme.title: It! The Terror From Beyond Space, (1958, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The survivor of a space expedition claims his crew was killed by an alien creature. The rescue captain dismisses the explanation only to find that a creature has stowed away on the spacecraft and begins to hunt the human hosts.

programme.title: Invaders From Mars, (1953, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the early 1950s, Cold War tensions and the burgeoning space race created a heady mix of paranoia and unbridled creativity as filmmakers speculated as to the marvels - and horrors - that lay beyond the stars.

programme.title: When Worlds Collide, (1951, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy)
programme.desc: An impending collision with a runaway star signals the destruction of Earth. As doomsday approaches, people race against time and the panic of those who will be left behind.

programme.title: The Beast With A Million Eyes, (1955, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An unspeakable horror! Extraterrestrial terror is on the hunt for human flesh in this horrifying tale of invasion! This is a 1950s creature-feature with some serious sociological bite! Paul Birch, Lorna Thayer, and Richard Sargent star!

programme.title: X: The Man With The X-Ray Eyes, (1963, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy)
programme.desc: Ray Milland stars as a brilliant scientist who tests a formula for x-ray vision on himself and discovers that his ability to see through walls, clothing, and flesh is eclipsed by an insatiable desire to see more than any mortal can possibly bear!

programme.title: Salt of the Earth, (1954, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Mexican workers at a Zinc mine call a general strike. It is only through the solidarity of the workers, and importantly the indomitable resolve of their wives, mothers and daughters, that they eventually triumph.

programme.title: Detour, (1945, Action)
programme.desc: Chance events trap hitch-hiker Al Roberts in a tightening net of film noir trouble.

programme.title: How to Succeed in Business Without Really Trying, (1967, Musical)
programme.desc: This hilarious musical stars Robert Morse as a charming and scheming window washer who climbs to the top of the corporate ladder by way of a self-help book.

programme.title: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum, (1966, Comedy)
programme.desc: Zero Mostel, Buster Keaton, Phil Silvers, and an all-star cast scam their way through this boisterous romp amidst gorgeous girls, mistaken identities, stunning surprises, cunning disguises, and great Sondheim songs.

programme.title: Tears of the Sun, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: After a West African president's family is assassinated and civil unrest is rampant, a top-secret team is deployed to the far reaches of the jungle to rescue a U.S. doctor who is acting as a missionary.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gripping, gut-wrenching thriller that delivers suspense in almost unbearable doses, IN THE LINE OF FIRE showcases Clint Eastwood at his finest. In a performance that won universal acclaim, Eastwood stars as Frank Horrigan. Rated: R

programme.title: Tigerland, (2000, Drama)
programme.desc: As a nation stands divided over the war in Vietnam, stark differences of opinion surface among the men of A-Company, triggering unexpected and far-reaching consequences.

programme.title: Death Warrant, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude van Damme ("Bloodsport", "Cyborg") is a veteran undercover cop posing as an inmate in a dangerously corrupt state prison.

programme.title: Hardcore Henry, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Henry is resurrected from death with no memory, and he must save his wife from a telekinetic warlord with a plan to bio-engineer soldiers.

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.title: Hollow Man, (2000, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Kevin Bacon and Elisabeth Shue play former lovers who, along with a team of other scientists like themselves, discover the secret of invisibility. Rating: R

programme.title: The Haunting In Connecticut, (2009, Horror)
programme.desc: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, which turns out to be a former mortuary and sance parlor.

programme.title: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia, (2013, Horror)
programme.desc: When a family moves from the city to a centuries-old house in rural Georgia, they are terrorized by malicious spirits seeking revenge.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers, (2001, Horror)
programme.desc: After making a horrific discovery in the basement of a old church, Trish and her brother Darry watch their routine road trip home turn into a heart stopping race for their lives. They are now the chosen prey of a force that relentlessly pursues them.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers 2, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: The Creeper terrorizes a group of varsity basketball players, cheerleaders and coaches who are stranded on a highway after their bus breaks down. Fighting their own fears and prejudices the group of athletes are forced to come together to stay alive.

programme.title: Dead Ringers, (1988, Thriller)

programme.desc: Injected with human brain cells, a super-intelligent female monkey is enlisted to help a wheelchair-bound quadriplegic get on with his life.

programme.title: Coming to America, (1988, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Join EDDIE MURPHY on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World. As an African Prince, it's time for him to find a princess. The mission leads him and his most loyal friend (ARSENIO HALL) to New York. Watch Murphy and Hall in classic cameo roles!

programme.title: Trading Places, (1983, Screwball)
programme.desc: The story of a down-and-out con artist who trades lifestyles with a well-to-do investor.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop, (1984, Comedy)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: The heat's back on! And Eddie Murphy is cool as ever in this sizzling, smash-hit sequel to Beverly Hills Cop.

programme.title: Drive, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: When a prototype 'enhanced human' on the run from hit men hooks up with a dread-locked bystander, the two elude their pursuers. Starring Brittany Murphy ("8 Mile").

programme.desc: A nuclear weapon has been stolen by the most powerful gang in Paris' treacherous ghetto, and it's up to a determined cop and a vigilante criminal in search of his sister to infiltrate the sector, save the girl, and get the bomb out of the bad guys' hands.

programme.title: District 13: Ultimatum, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Two years have passed since elite police officer Damien Tomasso teamed up with reformed vigilante Leito to save the notorious District 13, a racially charged ghetto populated by violent drug-dealing gangs and vicious killers.

programme.title: Accident Man, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mike is a tough hitman, who makes his hits look like accidents or suicide. He's in a gang of hitmen, each with his own style. When his loved ex is killed, Mike looks for those responsible.

programme.title: Accident Man: Hitman's Holiday, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: A hit man must beat the top assassins in the world.

programme.title: Ong Bak, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Raised by monks who taught him the Thai martial art of muay thai, Ting (Tony Jaa) is sent to Bangkok to retrieve the stolen head of the town's statue of the Buddha.

programme.title: Ong Bak 2: The Beginning, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Tony Jaa stars in this epic tale of revenge set hundreds of years in the past. This prequel to Ong-Bak: The Thai Warrior takes Jaa's skills to the next level, showcasing him as a master of a wide range of martial arts styles.

programme.title: Clerks II, (2006, Screwball)

programme.title: Clerks III, (2022, Screwball)
programme.desc: Following a massive heart attack, Randal enlists his friends and fellow clerks Dante, Elias, Jay, and Silent Bob to make a movie immortalizing his life at the convenience store that started it all.

programme.title: Waiting..., (2005, Screwball)
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds, Anna Ferris, and Justin Long serve up the laughs as young waiters and waitresses searching for the meaning of life, love, and friendship in this outrageous comedy.

programme.title: Uptown Girls, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Molly Gunn is the daughter of a late rock legend, and the toast of New York City. But when her inheritance is stolen, Molly is forced to do something she's never done before - get a job. Molly becomes a nanny to a girl, who is "eight going on forty."

programme.title: Heartbreakers, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Max and Page are a mother/daughter con team. Max targets wealthy men and marries them. Page then seduces them while Max "catches" her wayward husbands in the act. Then on to the next mark, posing in a variety of guises to keep one step ahead of the law.

programme.title: The Overnight, (2015, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Alex (Adam Scott), Emily (Taylor Schilling) and their son RJ are new to LA. A chance meeting, introduces them to the mysterious Kurt (Jason Schwartzman), Charlotte and Max. A family playdate becomes increasingly interesting as the night goes on.

programme.title: Hollywood Homicide, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: A pair of detectives investigate a murder while pursuing their other full-time professions. Welcome to Hollywood Homicide - the only place where you can come to work hungry, horny, thirsty, and broke, and resolve all four by the end of the watch.

programme.title: Adaptation, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Director Spike Jonze delivers a stunningly original comedy that seamlessly blends fictional characters and situations with the lives of real people. As Charlie struggles to adapt Orlean's best-selling book "The Orchid Thief".Rated: R

programme.title: When Harry Met Sally, (1989, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: As Harry Burns and Sally Albright build their lives and careers in Manhattan, their paths continue to cross and their friendship continues to grow until they confront the decision whether to let their friendship develop into romance.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire, (1996, Drama)
programme.desc: Jerry Maguire is a sports agent who is brought to a point of crisis in his life when he decides to become an honorable man. Follow his journey to redemption through an unlikely alliance with a female accountant, and his least important client.

programme.title: Julie & Julia, (2009, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Julie & Julia, tells the true stories of how Julia Child's life and cookbook inspired fledgling writer Julie Powell to whip up 524 recipes in 365 days and introduce a new generation to the magic of French cooking.

programme.title: Angel Eyes, (2001, Drama)

programme.title: Benny & Joon, (2006, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Johnny Depp and Mary Stuart Masterson star in this quirky romantic Drama about two misfits who Comedye together as a result of an unusual poker game. Aidan Quinn and Julianne Moore co-star.

programme.title: Nicholas Nickleby, (2002, Drama)
programme.desc: After Nicholas' father dies and leaves the Familyy penniless, the Nickleby Family moves to London to stay with their Uncle Ralph. Ralph turns abusive and separates the family.

programme.title: Becoming Jane, (2007, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Anne Hathaway gives a radiant performance as a young, lovestruck Jane Austen in this witty and engaging comedy, exploring the untold romance that inspired the novels of one of the worlds most celebrated authors.

programme.title: Shakespeare In Love, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: After providing inspiration to Will Shakespeare, his case of writer's block cured, and a taste for romance rekindled by the mysterious Lady Viola. Gwyneth Paltrow, Joseph Fiennes, Ben Affleck, and Dame Judi Dench star in this Best Picture winner.

programme.title: Patriot Games, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan is caught in the middle of a terrorist attack. Ryan helps to thwart Holmes assailants and becomes a local hero. But Ryans act marks him as a target. Now he must return to action to save his family.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)

programme.title: The Boondock Saints, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

programme.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo, (2011, Crime)

programme.title: The Cold Light of Day, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Sigourney Weaver and Henry Cavill star in this pulse-pounding thriller about a man trying to save his kidnapped family.

programme.title: Patriot Games, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan is caught in the middle of a terrorist attack. Ryan helps to thwart Holmes assailants and becomes a local hero. But Ryans act marks him as a target. Now he must return to action to save his family.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: Revolver, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: Philadelphia, (1993, Drama)

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Western)

programme.title: The Return of A Man Called Horse, (1976, Western)
